These victims who are often older, veterans, and first generation students should be able to access relief from the loans they took out to attend these fraudulent schools and move forward with their lives.
#StandWithStudents pic.twitter.com/FWWQET4b0S

Students defrauded by for-profit colleges are often left with crippling debt, useless degrees and none of the opportunities they were promised. This is wrong and today the House of Representatives reversed an unnecessarily cruel rule, enacted by Secretary DeVos.

My staff will be hosting. mobile office hours at the Lincoln County Veteran Service Office tomorrow from 9 am to 1 pm.  If you are having an issue with a federal agency please stop by and meet with one of my caseworkers.
 
1231 SE Bay Blvd Suite A, Newport, OR 97365
The U.S. must not become involved in another conflict in the Middle East.

I have long opposed U.S. intervention in the Middle East. I cosponsored and voted for a resolution today that would prevent the President from taking further military action in Iran without Congressional approval.

Since I came to Congress in 2009, I have adamantly opposed military intervention in the Middle East. I remain staunchly opposed to U.S. involvement in another costly conflict in the Middle East. 

Read my full statement below: https://schrader.house.gov/newsroom/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=392656 …

Nick Fish was the definition of what public service should be. He served the community of Portland honorably and put people above ideology. His loss will be felt deeply and I will miss him greatly. My thoughts are with the Fish family during this time. https://www.oregonlive.com/portland/2020/01/portland-commissioner-nick-fish-dies-of-cancer.html?outputType=amp&__twitter_impression=true …
